name: The Adventures of Robot X
description:
Title Screen

The Adventures of Robot X is a short platform game in the spirit of Megaman. It was made in under 96 hours between February 25th and March 1st, 2021 for the GMC Jam 40, 10 year Anniversary.  The Genocidal Machine Corporation (GMC) celebrates it's 10 year anniversary. But your friend Roger left his keys to the liquor store inside The Factory, a hazardous area for non-employees... Meet a few interesting characters as you blast your way through 3 levels of murderous robots, pesky bird bots, mean saw blades, pit hazards, spikes, and finally a confrontation with the Interrogator.
